Reference

All functions

qf_bind_rows_tweets()

Create a single data frame from a vector of Twitter handles

qf_create_hashtag_list()

Create an ordered list of hashtags (tipically, to be used in a shiny app)

qf_create_language_list()

Create a list of available languages (tipically, to be used in a shiny app)

qf_create_trending_hashtag_list()

Create an ordered list of hashtags (tipically, to be used in a shiny app)

qf_find_list_id()

Fin the ID of Twitter lists.

qf_get_tweets_by_user()

Extracts and stores tweets locally

qf_get_tweets_from_list()

Extracts and stores tweets locally Extracts and stores tweets locally based on Twitter lists

qf_wordcloud_app()

Starts wordcloud shiny app

run_app()

Run the Shiny Application
